name: CMSSignerStatus
desc: The constants that indicate the status of the signature and signer information in a signed message.

items.name: case valid
items.desc: The message was signed and both the signature and the signer certificate have been verified.

items.name: case needsDetachedContent
items.desc: The message was signed but has detached content. You must call the CMSDecoderSetDetachedContent(_:_:) function before ascertaining the signature status.

items.name: case invalidSignature
items.desc: The message was signed but the signature is invalid.

items.name: case invalidCert
items.desc: The message was signed but the signer's certificate could not be verified.

items.name: case invalidIndex
items.desc: The specified value for the signer index (signerIndex parameter) is greater than the number of signers of the message minus one (signerIndex > (numSigners â€“ 1)).
